newsitem.title: POLAND: Zloty closes firmer vs basket, one-day depos down.
newsitem.headline: Zloty closes firmer vs basket, one-day depos down.

text.p: 1330 GMT - The Polish zloty closed at 3.23/3.18 percent from the parity rate, stronger than yesterday's close at 3.19/3.16 percent after tracking dollar/mark swings in European trade, dealers said.
* It closed at 2.8570/85 to the dollar, down from 2.8545/55 on Wednesday and at 1.8375/85 to the mark, up from 1.8388/95.
* O/N at 20.00/20.75 pct vs opening's 21.30/21.50 pct.
* T/N at 20.00/20.75 pct vs opening's 21.35/21.60 pct after the NBP refrained from draining the market.
* Polish unemployment rose to 13.3 pct in November from 13.2 pct October. -- Warsaw Newsroom +48 22 653 9700
